short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support me with no money! This app replaces product links with my affiliate tags so you can support me without thinking! Thank you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app is mainly for viewers who watch me on Twitch or YouTube. This app allows viewers to support me and my channel without having to spend money. This app allows them to support me by doing shopping they were already going to do.

Currently, this only works with Amazon but I'm looking to include eBay as well in the near future. 
I am an Amazon and Ebay partner/affiliate

Channels:
